full_summary:
# Canada Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) Solicitates Standing Offer for Propane Units Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul Services

### Solicitation Details

| **Field** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Reference Number** | WS4156899414 |  |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |  |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-08-21 | Date de publication |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-09-15T14:00:00 | Délai de cloture |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2023-10-01 | Date prévue de début du contrat |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2024-09-30 | Date prévue de fin du contrat |

### Solicitation Description

The Department of National Defence (DND), on behalf of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites offers from Suppliers to provide Propane Units Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul (PMRO) Services to various locations within Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax. This is a solicitation for a Standing Offer.

### Notice Type and Procurement Method

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

### Justification for the Procurement Method

A competitive open-bidding process is being used to obtain the best value for the Government.

### Selection Criteria

The selection criteria for evaluation of Respondents to this solicitation are:
*   **Pricing**: The lowest price will be selected as the best value to the Government.

### Services Required

A variety of PMRO services are needed, including, but not limited to, maintenance, repairs and overhaul of Propane Units at various locations at CFB Halifax.

### Inquiry Procedure

If there are any questions or concerns with the solicitation documents, all inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature are to be submitted in writing to Kate Mintzer. Email: [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Respondents should submit their inquiries not less than 5 (five) calendar days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time to respond.
